directions: In a bowl, combine miso, sugar, broth, oil, and ginger. Add chicken; coat, cover and refrigerate 1 hour. Mix vegetables in a bowl with vinegar and salt; set aside. Heat oven to 375°. Place chicken on a cookie sheet lined with foil. Fold up edges of foil. Pour marinade over chicken. Bake 20 minutes or until cooked through. Combine rice with vegetable mix. Cool chicken for 5 minutes; slice each breast diagonally into 3 pieces. Serve chicken over rice with soy sauce on the side.
ingredients: 1/2 cup white miso paste (found at health food stores)
4 skinless, boneless chicken breasts (about 3 oz each)
title: Miso-Glazed Chicken Breast with Vegetable Sushi Rice
